name: Marinara Sauce
description: The Audrey Hepburn of pasta sauces. Marinara is a simple, yet beautiful tomato-based sauce. The robust flavours of garlic, herb and oregano in Marinara Sauce Mix brings a taste of elegance to any pasta dish. Use for pasta, pizza, or add to soups for a burst of bright tomato flavor. Use as a dipping sauceâ€”a healthier, lower-sugar alternative to ketchup.
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, combine diced tomatoes, crushed tomatoes and sauce mix. Simmer for 15 min.
tips: Portion into Prep Bowls. Freeze leftovers up to three months.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.
